checkbox.name: Window Mechanics
checkbox.desc: If checked, windows will move around while playing Paranoia. You can disable if you find this annoying.

checkbox.name: Transparent Window
checkbox.desc: If checked, the window will go transparent during a specific part in Paranoia. May or may not work depending on your pc specs!!

checkbox.name: Wallpaper
checkbox.desc: If checked, the wallpaper will get changed during a specific part in Paranoia. Your original wallpaper comes back when ending, restarting, or leaving the song though!

checkbox.name: Hide Apps
checkbox.desc: If checked, all of your apps running in the background will get hidden during a specific part in Paranoia. This will not fully close your apps by the way, so you don't have to worry about your work being lost!

checkbox.name: Shaders
checkbox.desc: If checked, shaders will occur in paranoia. Disable if you're sensitive to cameras duplicating and/or if you are sensitive to flashy shaders.

checkbox.name: Streamer Mode
checkbox.desc: Changes parameters that can be annoying when playing. If you are a streamer or if you are recording this game, we recommend you to activate this option. (This does not disable other options in this menu.)

checkbox.name: Flashing Lights
checkbox.desc: If checked, flashing lights will occur in menus and songs. Disable if you are sensitive to this!

number.name: alpha
number.desc: Sets the transparency of the screen filter, increase it if you have a hard time seeing notes

checkbox.name: Coloured Timebar
checkbox.desc: Makes the TimeBar coloured based on the opponents healthbar colour.
